conclusion: The area under the v-t graph for Car A is a triangle with base = 25 s and height = 25 m/s.

conclusion: Initial distance (no collision) = 218.75 m - 312.5 m = -93.75 m.
The negative value indicates that Car A was 93.75 m ahead of the position where Car B started.
